name: helicopter man
description:
no i didnt repost this what are you talking about 

i like ragdolls, have some ragdolls

spin your mouse in a circle to fly up (better on trackpad)

w a  space s to move left, right, jump, and limp respectively

v to switch from attract (red) to repel (blue)

dont tell me that the health is bugged, ur just bad

e to spawn an enemy

The boss: Knucklehead

Never skips leg day.

His legs are extremely dangerous, but don't mess with the arms either. My strategy is to fly up to his head and spin your arms on it to chip him a little at a time.
